subject: Headquarters:
body:
Headquarters:
International Monetary Fund
700 19th Street, N.W.
Washington, D.C. 20431
 
Attn: Fund Beneficiary
 
With reference to your entitlement fund and inline with the CHANGE OF BENEFICARY'S APPLICATION, signed by Mr Calvin R. Hemming with your purported authorization. This issue has been carefully examined and we have declined Calvin R. Hemming's application as the application lacks regular signature. But Did you ever instruct Mr Calvin R. Hemming to claim your fund worth US$10.000.000? Below is the bank account information provided by Mr Calvin R. Hemming saying that you authorized him to claim your fund that you are terminally ill.
 
Bank Name: Bank of America
Account Name:: Calvin R. Hemming
ACCT NO: 586025513245
Routing No: 111000025
Bank Address 9711 Bissonnet St. Houston, Tx 77036
 
If you had not authorized the change of your bank account in respect to your outstanding entitlement Payment, therefore notify me immediately as the notification / declaration was supported with a sworn affidavit from Texas high court ref: ilk /jj/202/k2023, dated Monday 18th December,,2023 and signed by Mr Calvin R. Hemming who claim and stated in the sworn declaration that you authorized him to claim the said fund on your behalf to a different bank account in the U.S. as stated above because you were terminally ill and the Doctor who is in charge of your case stated that you will not stay more than one Month before passing away.
 
This development has caused lots of discrepancies in your payment file that is why we had to suspend your payment and prompted you to contact you directly before re-validating your payment. You can be rest assured that I will do everything within my capacity to successfully actualize the quick transfer of your fund to any of your nominated bank accounts.
 
Kindly get back to me as soon as possible so that I will direct you on what to do.
Best Regards.
KRISTALINA GEORGIEVA,
Deputy Managing Director: BO LI,

subject: Re:   Headquarters:
body:
Hello KRISTALINA GEORGIEVA,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I must say, this is quite a surprise! I don't recall ever instructing Mr. Calvin R. Hemming to claim any fund on my behalf. In fact, I've never even met the man.

I'm also not terminally ill, thank goodness! It seems there's been some sort of mix-up here. Could you please provide more information about this fund? How did it come into existence and why would it be under my name?

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Donna

subject: Re: Headquarters:
body:
International Monetary Fund
700 19th Street, N.W.
Washington, D.C. 20431


Attn Donna

Your detailed message to my office was clearly received and I was surprised
to hear from you that you did not give any authorization to anybody to
receive your funds on your behalf.

Well, on this note I have to advise you professionally as the director of
foreign operations to dislodge this counterclaim on your fund by getting
the letter of authorization affidavit and proof of ownership from the chief
judge of High Court here in Washington, D.C. in your name immediately to
prove to so called Calvin R. Hemming that you have never given any
authorization letter to him to change your bank account, that is the only
way out for you to still have access to your fund again.

Therefore, for this reason I will not do any other thing regards to this
matter now unless you ask me to check from the chief judge of the high
court what it will cost you to get those needful legal documents from his
office that will prove you as the true beneficiary of the fund and without
this done with every urgency you may lose the chances of gaining this fund
because it has been approved on the so called Calvin R. Hemming before your
message came in this to my office.

1. Letter of Authorization
2. Affidavit and fact and claim
3. Prove of fund ownership certificate


I have already put a hold on your file immediately I got this message from
you until the appropriate documentation is been made on your behalf legally
so that you will still stand a chance to receive this fund from my office
at this first quarter payment 2024, by then you must have secured those
approved legal documents from the authorities concerned and without that
count me out because I will not hold responsible for any misappropriation
of funds to any wrong account etc.

On your request I will give you the exact amount it will cost you to get
those documents from the chief judge of High Court



Yours faithfully,


KRISTALINA GEORGIEVA,
Deputy Managing Director: BO LI,

subject: Re: Headquarters:
body:
Hello KRISTALINA GEORGIEVA,

Thank you for your detailed message. I appreciate your guidance on this matter. It's a bit confusing to me, but I'm trying my best to understand.

So, if I understood correctly, I need to get a letter of affidavit and proof of ownership from the chief judge of High Court? Could you please explain more about these documents? What exactly do they contain and how will they help in proving that I have never given any letter to Calvin R. Hemming?

Also, you mentioned that it will cost me to get these documents. Can you provide an estimate of how much it might be? 

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Donna

subject: Re: Headquarters:
body:

20431 Attn DonnaThank you so much for your acknowledgement message to my
office, based on the urgency it required I have done the needful by
contacting the chief judge of  High Court  over the issuance of those legal
documents in your name to authenticate your claim to be genuine and legal
as the true rightful owner of the fund.Therefore, it will interest you to
know that after my communication with the chief judge of the  high court
concerning your matter on ground on how to secure those needful documents
and the chief judge said those aforementioned documents are the only
documents that will prove you as the true beneficiary of the said fund,
below this message is the calculated amount you are to pay to get those

documented as a working documents which you will present to any authority

about receiving within the next 72hrs upon receipt of the legal

either your office or your home contact including your telephone number and

Regards.KRISTALINA GEORGIEVA,Deputy Managing Director: BO LI,  *

subject: Re: Headquarters:
body:
Hello BO LI,

Thank you for your detailed message. It's quite interesting to learn about the legal procedures involved in this process. I appreciate your efforts in contacting the chief judge of the High Court on my behalf.

I understand that these documents are crucial to establish my claim as genuine and legal. However, I'm a bit confused about the cost calculation you mentioned. Could you please provide a breakdown of these costs? I would like to understand what each charge is for.

Also, could you clarify what exactly these documents are? What kind of information will they contain? And why do they need to be sent in original copies?

You mentioned needing my most recent address, telephone number, and a copy of my ID. While I understand the necessity of this information for official purposes, I'm afraid I can't share them over email due to privacy concerns. Is there another secure way we can handle this?

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Donna

subject: Re: Headquarters:
body:
Hello BO LI,

Thank you for your detailed message. I appreciate the time and effort you've put into explaining the importance of these documents. I must admit, I'm not very familiar with all these legal terms and procedures.

subject: Re: Headquarters:
body:

subject: Re: Headquarters:
body:
*International Monetary Fund700 19th Street, N.W.Washington, D.C.
20431 Attn DonnaYou should not be asking about how to go to a mall. One
third of the people in the world knows and uses bitcoin for proper and safe
transactions. As you said that it is new to you, do as I said before. If
you are unsure on how to send the money via bitcoin, go to a nearby
supermarket, they often have helpful staff there that can assist you with
tech-related stuff like this. Just explain your situation to them, and they
will be able to guide you through the process step by step.If you know you
are not familiar with bitcoin, you can ask for a bank account to where to
send the money.   Best Regards.KRISTALINA GEORGIEVA,Deputy Managing
Director: BO LI,   *

subject: Re: Headquarters:
body:
